alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clermont (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 6:29AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL CLERMONT AND WEST CENTRAL BROWN COUNTIES THROUGH 700 AM EDT... At 629 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located from near Terrace Park to near Mount Orab, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Milford, Georgetown, Forestville, Amelia, Mount Orab, Bethel, New Richmond, Williamsburg, Batavia, Withamsville, Hamersville, Perintown, Saltair, New Palestine, Nicholsville, Feesburg, New Hope, Clermont County Airport, Lindale and Mount Carmel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
